short_summary: Procurement NPP #202215201 for monitor arms and delivery to Ottawa by deadline of March 31, 2023.
description: This procurement covers a requirement from the following Product Categories of the SA:",
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
#### Request for Proposal (RFP) ID: 20221520
#### Reference Number: PW-22-01013516
#### Solicitation Number: 20221520

The Financial Consumer Agency of Canada (FCAC) invites interested bidders to participate in a Request for Proposal (RFP) to purchase and deliver monitor arms to their office location in Ottawa, Ontario. This requirement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, and the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement.

**Tender Details**

* Tender Title (English): Monitor Arms and Delivery to Ottawa for Financial Consumer Agency of Canada
* Tender Title (French): Supports d'écran et livraison à Ottawa pour l'Agence de la consommation en matière financière du Canada
* Tender Closing Date: November 25, 2022, at 14:00 EST
* Contact Information
  * Name: Kyryakov, Pavlo
  * Email: FCAC.Contract-Contrat.ACFC@fcac-acfc.gc.ca
  * Phone: 613-941-1432

**Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)**

The proposed procurement is covered under Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/xxx /PQ. The requirement is for the purchase and delivery of monitor arms, which are part of the Product Category 5 – Ancillary and Lighting Products.

**_attachments_

Refer to the attached documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP) package and the Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP), for further details on this tender opportunity.

[Attachments provided separately] (/filepath/attachments)
#### Contact Information

For any questions or clarifications regarding this tender opportunity, please contact Pavlo Kyryakov at the above-provided email or phone number.
